source: SEC EDGAR Financial Statement Data Sets (2025Q4)
description: XBRL financial statement data from annual 10-K filings, joined across SUB/NUM/TAG/PRE tables

items.label: Common stock, par value (in dollars per share)
items.definition: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

items.label: Marketable securities
items.definition: Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as current.

items.label: Accounts receivable, net
items.definition: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

items.label: Vendor non-trade receivables
items.definition: The sum of amounts currently receivable other than from customers. For classified balance sheets, represents the current amount receivable, that is amounts expected to be collected within one year or ...

items.label: Inventories
items.definition: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

items.label: Other current assets
items.definition: Amount of current assets classified as other.

items.label: Total current assets
items.definition: Amount of asset recognized for present right to economic benefit, classified as current.

items.label: Marketable securities
items.definition: Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as noncurrent.

items.label: Property, plant and equipment, net

items.label: Other non-current assets
items.definition: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

items.label: Total non-current assets
items.definition: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold or consumed after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

items.label: Total assets
items.definition: Amount of asset recognized for present right to economic benefit.

items.label: Accounts payable

items.label: Other current liabilities
items.definition: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

items.label: Deferred revenue
items.definition: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

items.label: Commercial paper

items.label: Term debt
items.definition: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt classified as current. Excludes lease obligation.

items.label: Total current liabilities
items.definition: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

items.label: Term debt
items.definition: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt classified as noncurrent. Excludes lease obligation.

items.label: Other non-current liabilities
items.definition: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

items.label: Total non-current liabilities
items.definition: Amount of obligation due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

items.label: Total liabilities
items.definition: Amount of liability recognized for present obligation requiring transfer or otherwise providing economic benefit to others.

items.definition: Amount of par value plus amounts in excess of par value or issuance value for common stock issued.

items.label: Accumulated deficit
items.definition: Amount of accumulated undistributed earnings (deficit).

items.label: Accumulated other comprehensive loss
items.definition: Amount, after tax, of accumulated increase (decrease) in equity from transaction and other event and circumstance from nonowner source.

items.label: Total shareholders equity
items.definition: Amount of equity (deficit) attributable to parent. Excludes temporary equity and equity attributable to noncontrolling interest.

items.label: Total liabilities and shareholders equity
items.definition: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

items.label: Net income
items.definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

items.label: Depreciation and amortization
items.definition: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

items.label: Share-based compensation expense
items.definition: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

items.definition: Amount classified as cash and cash equivalents attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

items.label: Net income
items.definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

items.label: Other gains (losses)
items.definition: Amount of increase (decrease) in other comprehensive income, after tax, from changes classified as other.

items.label: Other reclassifications included in net income
items.definition: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

items.label: Total other comprehensive (loss) income
items.definition: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

items.label: Balance at beginning of period
items.definition: Amount of equity (deficit) attributable to parent and noncontrolling interest. Excludes temporary equity.

items.label: Net income
items.definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

items.label: Dividends per share announced
items.definition: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

items.label: Equipment and services

items.label: Licensing

items.label: Total revenues

items.label: Cost of revenues
items.definition: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

items.label: Research and development

items.label: Selling, general and administrative
items.definition: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advert...

items.label: Other (Note 2)
items.definition: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue pro...

items.label: Total costs and expenses
items.definition: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

items.label: Operating income
items.definition: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

items.label: Interest expense
items.definition: Amount of interest expense classified as operating and nonoperating. Includes, but is not limited to, cost of borrowing accounted for as interest expense.

items.label: Investment and other income, net
items.definition: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

items.label: Income tax expense
items.definition: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

items.label: Income from continuing operations
items.definition: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

items.label: Net income
items.definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

items.label: Basic earnings per share, Continuing operations
items.definition: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

items.label: Basic earnings per share, Discontinued operations
items.definition: Per basic share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation.

items.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic, Total
items.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

items.label: Diluted earnings per share, Discontinued operations
items.definition: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation.
